actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 611 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide control and abatement of aircraft noise and sonic boom.

summary.text: Requires that not later than October 27, 1973, the Environmental Protection Agency shall submit to the Federal Aviation Administration proposed regulations to provide control and abatement of aircraft noise and sonic boom. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1431(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 611 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide control and abatement of aircraft noise and sonic boom.
